channel.title: INsmh
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from INsmh, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Sabina Nessa killer Koci Selamaj stabs prison guard with piece of 'smashed-up toilet'
item.description: Koci Selamaj was serving a minimum of 36 years for the sexually-motivated murder of primary school teacher Sabina Nessa - but today he was told he wil...

item.title: RAF ace wins medal review 70 years after top secret nuclear missions
item.description: Labour has announced it will consider a medal for the forgotten heroes blocked from an honour by the Tories

item.title: Doctor reveals 'shockingly small' amount of exercise that slashes your cancer risk
item.description: A mere few minutes of vigorous activity – such as running, cycling, and swimming – has been linked to a 20% decrease in the risk of developing cancer,...

item.title: Save 20% on ‘must have’ new thickening shampoo that makes hair look ‘fuller in a week’

item.title: Date UK State Pension to increase by £400 amid Winter Fuel Payment cuts
item.description: The latest figure is based on Treasury documents after a huge backlash over the controversial decision to axe the energy payment, worth up to £300, fr...
